text: England competed at the 1986 Commonwealth Games in Edinburgh, Scotland, between 24 July and 2 August 1986. England finished top of the medal table. ==Medal table (top three)== The athletes that competed are listed below. ==Athletics== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center" |- !width=250| Name
